fda_announcement: The FDA is aware of an emerging supply issue with [drug name]. We encourage stakeholders to report any significant supply disruptions.

The FDA is issuing a shortage alert for the recently identified drug shortage. We are actively working with manufacturers to coordinate increased production and supply chain adjustments. Stakeholders are encouraged to report further disruptions.

The FDA is aware of the emerging shortage and is working closely with stakeholders to resolve disruptions. Stakeholders are encouraged to report supply issues and coordinate on capacity adjustments. We are monitoring the situation closely.

The FDA is issuing a shortage alert for a medicine with current supply disruptions. We encourage manufacturers to increase production and buyers to refrain from stockpiling. Coordination is being facilitated to stabilize supply quickly.
